attributes.action: abolish car parking costs at Victoria Infirmary, Northwich
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the hospital is charging £3 car parking fee's. I would like to try and get the car parking charges at the Infirmary in Northwich abolished. It is stated in a book of old Northwich that the land and house (the old part of Northwich) should be used by the people of Northwich free of charge. They have CCTV they instruct you to park in desginated bays, failure to do this you will be issued with a £50 penalty notice. It also states Mid Cheshire Hospital isn't responisble for damage or theft to cars. What do the parking fee's go to?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
